content: a simple crochet witch hat pattern that you can make in a few hours perfect for last minute halloween costumes **materials** ▢1 skein dark purple yarn ▢5 5mm crochet hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring = magic_ring half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase 2 stitches in the same stitch blo = back loop only flo = front loop only crab stitch for the brim s edge
